Nietzsche, Wagner and the "Housing Bubble"

The class will examine the role of "debt" in Wagner`s Ring, with special attention paid to "The Rhinegold". Several theoretical texts with particular relevance to this problem will also be read, including the 2nd book of Nietzsche`s "Toward A Genealogy of Morals," and Walter Benjamin`s discussion of the "plotter" in his study of The Origins of the German Mourning Play. As background students may want to read David Graeber`s historical survey and discussion of the question of "debt": Debt: The First 5000 Years.
